root.name: Puzzle Arcade
root.description: Puzzle Arcade is an interactive jigsaw puzzle game coming to Xbox LIVE Arcade December 24,2008.This game will have co-op head to head play over Xbox Live future downloadable puzzle packs.This game is published by Eidos Interactive Ltd. developed by Ctxm/Say Design, Puzzle Arcade will cost 800 Microsoft Points.PUZZLE ARCADE’s features include: • A wide choice of puzzle images, including downloadable puzzle packs • Full support for the LIVE Vision camera to grab your own pictures and use them to make puzzles • A range of customizable game options • Play the traditional way with Classic mode or try Turbo mode for a more casual experience • A simple and intuitive control system • 3D virtual galleries
